summary.para: Representation of access point for different types of W3C content validators.
Represents a custom request for any W3C validation service.
Map of parameters (names/values) for the request.
Base exception that indicates an error in the process of document's validation.

member.name: M:W3CValidator.ValidationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the exception with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

member.param: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

summary.para: Map of parameters (names/values) for the request.
Entry point to access W3C validation services.
Returns validation provider instance to perform validating operations.
